attributes.action: streamline the application process for disabled persons and their carers applying for benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current process of application for benefits such as carers allowance, disability living allowance (both components), reduction in council tax and so on, is a long winded one with many applicants being put off by the shear volume of paperwork that has to be filled out in order to apply for the benefit or allowance.
A single set of forms which the applicant fills out along with supporting evidence from the medical profession should enough for a government organisation to determine the authenticity of the application and the level of ensuing benefits that the applicant is eligible for.
